video.title: Wild China
video.synopsis: This six-part series uncovers some of the most exotic and uncharted natural habitats hidden within the vast and diverse topography of China.

episodes.synopsis: The hills of Guilin and the cormorant fishermen of the Li River form the heart of this exploration of the colourful cultures of southern China.
episodes.title: Heart of the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: Jewel-colored birds and ancient tribes share forested valleys where elephants roam. How do these forests exist? The rugged landscape holds the key.
episodes.title: Shangri-La

episodes.synopsis: The vast Tibetan plateau is home to a culture shaped by Buddhism, while its mountains and glaciers provide vital life support for half the planet.
episodes.title: Tibet

episodes.synopsis: The extreme landscapes north of the Great Wall, where life is always on the edge, have shaped some of China's most vibrant people and wildlife.
episodes.title: Beyond the Great Wall

episodes.synopsis: China is home to the giant panda, golden snub-nosed monkey and golden takin. But the nation faces environmental problems.
episodes.title: Land of the Panda

episodes.synopsis: Ancient cultures, traditional villages, wildlife and futuristic cities jostle along China's fertile eastern seaboard, fighting for resources.
episodes.title: Tides of Change
